description.short: Search and share candidate details for job fair.
description.full: Get real-time candidate details and share them in a conversation. Search by skills, location or availability.

commands.title: General
commands.description: Find number of candidates or listed entities using keywords, key skills, availability, and so on.
commands.semanticDescription: Search for skill, location, and availability of the candidate.

parameters.name: Skill
parameters.title: Skillset of candidate
parameters.description: Skills of the candidates based on which candidate will be searched.

parameters.name: Location
parameters.title: Location of candidate
parameters.description: Location of the candidate based on which they will be searched.

parameters.name: Availability
parameters.title: Availability of candidate
parameters.description: Availability status of the candidate. Output format: >true or <false
